name: Apple Dropper (GSAS 2540 Fall 2021)
description:
Collect as many apples as you can! Make sure to avoid the bombs! Go for a high score!

(It seems that the background does not like loading properly for this specific game, which is unfortunate as it is made to be on itchi.io. However, due to project time limits, I will see if I can address this at a later date. As a whole, the game functions as it should, so I am satisfied.)
